title: Riot (apparently) believes Sona's only had "a small nerf."

replies.body: It really shows how disconnected Riot is from their own game if they can't recognize how badly all the different "small nerfs" add up on Sona.

I think of it like this, imagine if you contracted Riot to trim back a bothersome tree near your house.

The Riot team would show up, cut off a single branch, and leave for a month. Then they come back, trim another branch, and the same thing happens. This goes on for about 8 or 9 months until eventually the tree is missing the majority of it's limbs and can barely keep itself alive. When you confront the crew, they give a little chuckle and say they just did "a slight trimming".

Disclaimer: No {{champion:57}} were harmed in the making of this metaphor.
